job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: In this role, you should have excellent problem-solving skills and thorough knowledge of Android Device Architecture. Communication and documentation are key to this role as you will be working directly with the architecture and management teams.Understanding of Android Device Architecture. Focused on Kernel, HAL, DebugRead requirements predominantly related to Hardware peripherals, Integrate, provide HAL interface to ApplicationWe expect at least 50-60% of tasks will be related to codingPrevious knowledge on any device development is a plusPreferred EducationBachelor's Degree required or equivalent experienceMinimum of 5+ years of experienceKey Skills And CompetenciesDevice Driver and Hardware Abstraction Layer developmentKnowledge of Linux Kernel, BootloadersHands on Experience in development using any one of the languages C,C++, JAVAExcellent communication skillsExperience with Android DevelopmentDemonstrated technical experienceDemonstrated experience working independently and collaboratively on projectsDemonstrated experience trouble shootingBroad knowledge of applicable IT systems/applicationsExperience developing new systems and toolsExperience in documenting and maintaining up to date systems proceduresAdvanced analytical skills
